pr_title: KOGITO-1016: Merge Kogito examples and quickstarts repositories

timeline.message: Kogito with Apache Kafka quickstarts for both quarkus and spring boot
first version of process persistence powered by infinispan
upgrade version of infinispan for spring boot sample
quickstarts for kogito with inifinspan as backed for persistence of runtime data
added message config images
added additional quickstarts - service invocation and rest client
added hello world and business rules quickstarts
set version to 0.21.2 for quarkus and 0.3.0 for kogito
added user task based quickstart that is based on 0.4.0 work
added quickstarts illustrating custom life cycle and life cycle phases implementation
adjusted incorrect config and missing files
added note about latest stable release
upgrade to latest version for handling message events and the content based on cloud events, added new quickstarts that support REST api authorization
ipdated main readme file
updated readme file to include authorization information
fixed security setup for quarkus to be aligned with master, added optional config to be able to switch of cloud events for messages
added configuration for circleci
updated circleci config
added circleci badge
added nightly build trigger to circleci config
added nightly build trigger to circleci config
usertasks with security oidc - keycloak (#1)
fixed payload for unauthorized test
added kogito with timers example with option to use Kogito Job Service
disabled quarkus security test due to opened issue
unified url configuration parameters for job service to be valid URL format
moved to kogito-springboot-starter, added timer cycle tests, multip param service task
add bootstrap servers proeprties (#3)
Fix kogito timer readme, jobs-service (#2)
BAPL-1537 maven-deploy-plugin added to pluginManagement
BAPL-1537 empty line removed
KOGITO-538: Add Keycloak security integration to spring boot - kogito use case
KOGITO-1170 : Kogito Quick Starts Scripts / Hello World Update

KOGITO-1314: Use kogito-bom in quickstarts

fix quarkus pom -- for now use Alpha2

forgot committing a few examples; address comment

disable custom lifecycle quickstarts temporarily

revert lifecycle
fixed test for user task custom life cycle and added prediction service examples

timeline.bodyText: @evacchi probably this file is not needed, keeping just the one at the root level?
timeline.author: cristianonicolai
cristianonicolai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,131 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<project
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"

+  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+    <artifactId>kogito-examples</artifactId>
+    <version>8.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+

+
+  <name>Kogito-business-rules-quarkus</name>
+  <description>Kogito business rules invocation - Quarkus</description>
+
+
+  <properties>

timeline.bodyText: version should be handled by the bom already.
timeline.author: cristianonicolai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,140 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<project
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"
+  xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+    <artifactId>kogito-examples</artifactId>
+    <version>8.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>kogito-infinispan-persistence-quarkus</artifactId>
+
+  <name>Kogito-infinispan-persistence-quarkus</name>
+  <description>Kogito with Infinispan persistence - Quarkus</description>
+
+
+  <properties>
+  </properties>
+
+  <dependencyManagement>
+    <dependencies>
+      <dependency>
+        <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+        <artifactId>kogito-quarkus-bom</artifactId>
+        <version>${kogito.version}</version>
+        <type>pom</type>
+        <scope>import</scope>
+      </dependency>
+    </dependencies>
+  </dependencyManagement>
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+      <artifactId>quarkus-resteasy</artifactId>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+      <artifactId>quarkus-kogito</artifactId>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+      <artifactId>quarkus-infinispan-client</artifactId>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>io.quarkus</groupId>
+      <artifactId>quarkus-smallrye-openapi</artifactId>
+    </dependency>
+
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+      <artifactId>infinispan-persistence-addon</artifactId>
+      <version>${kogito.version}</version>

timeline.bodyText: this is probably worth its own property at the root pom to keep all examples aligned.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,136 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+  xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+  xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+    <artifactId>kogito-examples</artifactId>
+    <version>8.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+
+  <artifactId>kogito-infinispan-persistence-springboot</artifactId>
+  <name>Kogito-infinispan-persistence-springboot</name>
+  <description>Kogito with Infinispan persistence - Spring Boot</description>
+
+  <properties>
+  </properties>
+
+  <dependencyManagement>
+    <dependencies>
+      <dependency>
+        <groupId>org.infinispan</groupId>
+        <artifactId>infinispan-bom</artifactId>
+        <version>10.0.0.Beta3</version>
+        <type>pom</type>
+        <scope>import</scope>
+      </dependency>
+      <dependency>
+        <groupId>org.infinispan.protostream</groupId>
+        <artifactId>protostream</artifactId>
+        <version>4.3.0.Alpha8</version>
+      </dependency>
+      <dependency>
+        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+        <artifactId>spring-boot-dependencies</artifactId>
+        <version>${springboot.version}</version>
+        <type>pom</type>
+        <scope>import</scope>
+      </dependency>
+      <dependency>
+        <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+        <artifactId>kogito-bom</artifactId>
+        <version>${kogito.version}</version>
+        <type>pom</type>
+        <scope>import</scope>
+      </dependency>
+    </dependencies>
+  </dependencyManagement>
+
+  <dependencies>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
+      <artifactId>spring-boot-starter</artifactId>
+    </dependency>
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.infinispan</groupId>
+      <artifactId>infinispan-spring-boot-starter-remote</artifactId>
+      <version>${infinispan.version}</version>
+    </dependency>
+
+    <!-- kogito -->
+    <dependency>
+      <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+      <artifactId>kogito-springboot-starter</artifactId>
+      <version>${kogito.version}</version>

@@ -6,4 +6,100 @@ This module contains a number of examples that you can take a look at and try ou
 - Drools on Quarkus: see [README.md](drools-quarkus-example/README.md)
 - Drools on Quarkus with Unit: see [README.md](drools-quarkus-unit-example/README.md)
 - jBPM on Quarkus: see [README.md](jbpm-quarkus-example/README.md)
-- jBPM on SpringBoot: see [README.md](jbpm-springboot-example/README.md)
\ No newline at end of file
+- jBPM on SpringBoot: see [README.md](jbpm-springboot-example/README.md)
+
+# Kogito Quickstarts
+
+[![CircleCI](https://circleci.com/gh/mswiderski/kogito-quickstarts.svg?style=svg)](https://circleci.com/gh/mswiderski/kogito-quickstarts)
+
+A collection of quickstarts for Kogito that illustrates various uses case covered.
+
+Since Kogito aims at supporting both Quarkus and SpringBoot each quickstart should provide both type of projects.
+
+**To try it out locally on latest stable version download the released repository content [here](https://github.com/mswiderski/kogito-quickstarts/releases/latest)**
